Blackjack¶

Blackjack¶

class games.blackjack.game.blackjack.Blackjack(session_id: uuid.UUID)¶

Game class that handles all the functions for blackjack

add_player(player: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Adds a player to the blackjack game

Parameters

player – player to be added to the game

add_players_from_waiting_room() → None¶

Adds players from the waiting room to the game

all_ready() → bool¶
Returns

True if all players are ready, otherwise false

check_update_game_stage() → bool¶

Checks if all players are ready, and moves the game to the next stage if they are

Returns

True if all players were ready and the game was moved to the next stage. False otherwise

dict_representation()¶
Returns

A dictionary representation of the blackjack game

get_stage() → str¶
Returns

The current stage of the game

ready_up(player: accounts.models.CustomUser, ready_state: bool) → bool¶

Changes a players ready state

Parameters

  • player – player to change

  • ready_state – if the player is ready

Returns

True if all players are ready and game has moved to next stage; False otherwise

record_bet(player: accounts.models.CustomUser, amount: float) → None¶

Records a bet for a player

Parameters

  • player – user who is placing the bet

  • amount – the bet amount

record_bets() → None¶

Updates all players balances who places a bet

remove_player(player: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Removes a player from the blackjack game

Parameters

player – player to be removed from the game

reset() → None¶

Resets and re-initializes the game

start_round() → None¶

Starts a blackjack round

class games.blackjack.game.blackjack.BlackjackRound(pack: games.blackjack.game.utils.Pack, game_instance: games.blackjack.game.blackjack.Blackjack)¶

Class for a round of a blackjack game

check_dealers_turn() → None¶

Checks if it is the dealers turn to play

check_for_blackjack() → None¶

Checks to see if any player has a blackjack and makes any player that has blackjack ready

dict_representation()¶
Returns

a dictionary representation of the game

get_stage() → str¶
Returns

the stage of the game

initialize_hand() → None¶

Deals out two cards for all players and the dealer

make_player_ready(player: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Changes a players ready state to True

Parameters

player – player to ready up

payout_hand(player: accounts.models.CustomUser, hand: games.blackjack.game.utils.BlackjackHand) → None¶

Pays a player based on the outcome of their hand and how much they bet

Parameters

  • player – player to pay out to

  • hand – the players hand

play_dealer() → None¶

Plays the dealers part of blackjack

remove_player(player: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Removes a player from a round

Parameters

player – player to be removed

update_game(player: accounts.models.CustomUser, action: str) → None¶

Updates the game based on a users actions

Parameters

  • player – player that is updating the game

  • action – action that the player has chosen

class games.blackjack.game.utils.BlackjackHand¶

calculate_outcome(dealer) → None¶

Parameters

dealer – the dealer’s hand to compare this hand to

Appends a new card to the players hand

Parameters

new_card – new card to be added to the hand

Returns

True if the hand’s value is over 21. Otherwise False

Returns

a list containing the string representation of all the cords

class games.blackjack.game.utils.Dealer(pack: games.blackjack.game.utils.Pack)¶

Hand class for the blackjack dealer

play_hand() → None¶

Plays the dealers hand and adds cards till the value is 17+

class games.blackjack.game.utils.Pack(num_decks: int = 2, shuffle_pct: float = 0.75, card_class=<class 'utils.PlayingCards.card.Card'>)¶

Class for a pack of multiple Decks, like is used in blackjack

build() → None¶

Builds the pack and fills it with cards

check_reshuffle() → None¶

Checks if the deck needs to be reshuffled and reshuffles it if it does.

Deals a card

Returns

The card dealt

shuffle() → None¶

Builds and shuffles a new pack

Consumers¶

class games.blackjack.web.consumers.BlackjackConsumer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Websocket consumer class for the blackjack game that handles blackjack requests

connect() → None¶

Handles connecting a user to game channel and registering them for the session when a user connects to the web socket

disconnect(code)¶

Handles removing a user from the game channel and removing them from the session when a player navigates away from the game web page

Parameters

code – exit code
